body_html:
I agree with @martinwicke that tf.estimator.* does not have this restriction (at least one step train before predict).

If I understand you correctly, a simple code below might work as you expected:

if Train:
    estimator.train(train_input_fn, xxx)
else:
    estimator.predict(test_input_fn, xxx)

note: Do not comment training code anywhere, because they might be used to reconstruct the graph.

body:
I agree with @martinwicke that tf.estimator.* does not have this restriction (at least one step train before predict).

If I understand you correctly, a simple code below might work as you expected:
```python
if Train:
    estimator.train(train_input_fn, xxx)
else:
    estimator.predict(test_input_fn, xxx)
```

note: Do not comment training code anywhere, because they might be used to reconstruct the graph.
